: : Rodimus Prime : :
Rodimus Prime: That's ok with me.

Rodimus sits down, figuring that Yggdrasil will have to connect his computer with him.


Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:Yggdrasil nods and opens up a progrm on his in-set computer.

Yggdrasil: Good. The first step will be to pick up the traces of
Nightlight's program that remained from Elita's conception. If you
don't oppose, I'll use my own computer as it is more specialized than
your ship's.

able to get out and it would supply energon. He places her in it.

last was.
